merchant.title: You can start your perfume business at the lowest costs
merchant.first-service: We start with you from supplying perfumes to preparing your account as a merchant on the site and linking your account to inventory management systems and shipping companies in a timely manner. We also provide you with training on operations and business and support you with services
merchant.register-text: Open an online merchant account and start selling to any customer and anywhere in the world.
merchant.perfume-supply-text: After activating your merchant account, we start supplying perfumes and entering them into your account. We support the account with any new perfumes without any new payments.
merchant.inventory-text: We provide you with storage space in Riyadh, Jeddah and Dammam. An account as a merchant is linked to inventory management systems automatically, which supports the management of inventory movement, distribution and receipt movement upon supply for each new and upon delivery.
merchant.cargo-text: Your account is linked with the shipment management systems through multiple shipping companies on the same policy for the store and without additional costs
merchant.Multiple-payment-systems-text: Your account is linked to many payment systems that support you in increasing sales more easily
merchant.Marketing-text: We carry out promotional campaigns through social media platforms, celebrities or exhibitions to support the brand, which supports you in selling and winning customers.
merchant.Ongoing-training-and-support-text: We provide training and continuous support to support you in selling and managing your account as a merchant
merchant.Advertising-and-design-management-text: We provide paid advertising management services for free to any merchant on the site, and we also provide him with the necessary designs for the campaign
merchant.perfume-design-text: The possibility of producing special perfumes in the name of the store on demand in advanced stages.
merchant.merchant-registration-note: The number is limited and preference is determined by region, capital and experience

manufacturing.perfume-industry-text: We start with you from supplying perfumes to preparing your account as a merchant on the site and linking your account to inventory management systems and shipping companies in a timely manner. We also provide you with training on operations and business and support you with services
manufacturing.aromatic-note: The stage of choosing the aromatic note
manufacturing.aromatic-note-text: It begins with choosing and designing the note, the aromatic base, the components, the aromatic extract, the focus and the selection of the size.
manufacturing.aromatic-note-second-text: After opening an account for you, the specialized team will guide you to the most important aromatic notes, and you can design your own note
manufacturing.aromatic-note-span: See the page How to choose the aromatic note
manufacturing.designing-stage: The stage of designing the identity and shape of the fragrance
manufacturing.designing-stage-text: Where this stage begins with the selection and design of glass containers, choosing the most appropriate size, pump, covers, accessories, coloring, carton and packaging
manufacturing.preparing-stage: The stage of preparing your store
manufacturing.preparing-stage-text: We provide you with storage space in Riyadh, Jeddah and Dammam. An account as a merchant is linked to inventory management systems automatically, which supports the management of inventory movement, distribution and receipt movement upon supply for each new and upon delivery
manufacturing.support-stage-text: Your account is linked with the shipment management systems through multiple shipping companies on the same policy for the store and without additional costs
manufacturing.launch-stage-text: Your account is linked to many payment systems that support you in increasing sales more easily
manufacturing.representing-exhibitions-text: We carry out promotional campaigns through social media platforms, celebrities or exhibitions to support the brand, which supports you in selling and winning customers
manufacturing.store-management-service-text: We provide training and continuous support to support you in selling and managing your account as a merchant
manufacturing.limited-number: The number is limited and preference is determined by region, capital and experience

education.aromatic-text: It begins with choosing and designing the note, the aromatic base, the components, the aromatic extract, the focus and the selection of the size, After opening an account for you, the specialized team will guide you to the most important aromatic notes, and you can design your own note.

education.aromatic-groups-second-text: After opening an account for you, the specialized team will guide you to the most important aromatic notes, and you can design your own note.
